activities:
The rental and leasing of vehicles and the arranging for the renting and leasing of vehicles. Customer data (online and non-online) is received from the Austria, Croatia, Belgium, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, and the United Kingdom.   Additionally, Enterprise receives human resources data pertinent to employment applications.  It is now able to certify recruit information pertaining to residents of the U.K., Ireland and Germany.  It is not certifying any other human resources-related information at this time.  The following  sites are covered by this certification:     

1. www.enterprise.com
(http://www.enterprise.com/about/privacyPolicy.html)

2. www.alamo.com
(https://www.alamo.com/index.do?action=privacy.do&type=fullnav-uswww-footer)

3. www.nationalcar.com
(https://www.nationalcar.com/index.do?action=privacy.do&type=fullnav-zl-uszl-footer)

4. www.myehtrip.com
(https://www.myehtrip.com/home#/content/privacyPolicy)
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Leasing Services - (LES)Transportation Srvs (Except Aviation) - (TRN)Automobiles & Light Trucks/Vans - (AUT)
personaldata: All customer data and recruit data (online and non-online)
recoursemech: Enterprise Holdings, Inc. (Enterprise) will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints relating to our compliance with the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.   For complaints that cannot be resolved between Enterprise and the complainant not involving European Union human resources data, Enterprise has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the TRUSTe EU Safe Harbor program.  For complaints that cannot be resolved between Enterprise and the complainant involving European Union related human resources data, Enterprise has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European Union data protection authorities (EU DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
